ctk_list_item Struct Reference

#include <ctk_spu_list.h>


Data Fields

ea_addr_t next
ea_addr_t backing

Detailed Description

list item structure ('abstract' structure; the user-defined list item structure must have the 'next' and 'backing' member variables (of ea_addr_t) as the first elements of the structure. The 'backing' should hold the EA addr of the item data on the main memory.)

Field Documentation

ea_addr_t ctk_list_item::backing

the EA addr of the backing store for this item

ea_addr_t ctk_list_item::next

the 'next' item of this item; automatically maintained when the item is enqueued
